title: Assassin Creed: Shadows (by Ubisoft) [iPad]
author: mastery51
excerpt: WWDC 2024 Mac / iPad announcement, Ubisoft. Should be available later this year. [ATTACH] WWDC24 Announcement YouTube Video Clip....
siteName: TouchArcade - iPhone, iPad, Android Games Forum
text: Yes just announced. No specifics but I’m assuming iPad Pro m1 and up will be supported. No word on iPhone 15. Edit: "Game Porting Tool kit 2” was also announced, which should make it even easier for games that were released on Mac, could now also be ported over to other Apple devices. iPad / iPhone. Porting to Apple is definitely not easy at all and I believe it’s not going to be easy even with these new porting tools kits but, every bit helps. Gotcha just saw the game announcement wow I’m blown away I also like the look of the Mac version of Prince of Persia: The lost crown ( announced at WWDC 2024). Ubisoft didn’t announce any mobile version of this so probably don’t get hopes up. But to me it does look like it could be a good potential game that might come over to iPads and maybe iPhone 15 at some point. Question is this compatible with iPads with M1 and M2 ? Or is this game M4 only? Upgrading iPads next year planning on getting the 11 inch M4 this will be awesome on that Nice! I would recommend getting the one with the higher ram too. I feel like it helps in performance quite a bit when I’m playing the more demanding games. But I can’t say for certain since I don’t have an 8gb to compare it too. Just reviews from other players experiences with 8gb ram ipad pros. Gotcha I plan to get the 1 terabyte model with 16 gigs of ram this time This just got delayed again to March 20th 2025 don’t know if it’s for the iPad version? Share This Page
